node.statement: CRITICAL OBSTRUCTION. N(αw₁+βw₂) ≥ |α|N(w₁) fails when |α|N(w₁)=|β|N(w₂) and cancellation occurs in the ultrametric norm. Precisely: N(αw₁+βw₂) ≤ max(|α|N(w₁),|β|N(w₂)), with strict inequality possible when the maximum terms cancel. This is where the pathological norm bites — the chain structure allows unexpected cancellations. This case requires deeper analysis.
